wikipedia_page.main: Donald Edward Townsend (17 September 1930 – 29 July 2020) was an English footballer who played as a left back in the Football League. He was the father of former Ireland international Andy Townsend.Townsend died on 29 July 2020, at the age of 89.

response: He is the son of former Charlton Athletic and Crystal Palace defender Don Townsend.
